actions.text: Amendment SA 150 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 150 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S1427-1429) To provide for the document entitled "final environmental impact statement for the renewal of the federal grants for the trans-Alaska pipleline system right-of-way (FEIS)" dated 2002.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 150 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 150 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Murkowski.

purpose: To provide for the document entitled "final environmental impact statement for the renewal of the federal grants for the trans-Alaska pipleline system right-of-way (FEIS)" dated 2002.
